description:
Malicorne is a portly magic student at the Academy of Magic by Tristain where it is part of the Undine Knights under Guiche. Malicorne`s familiar is an owl, named Cubasil. He possesses a far vision spell. He has a crush on Tabitha`s familiar Illococo but finds out she is a dragon in a human form.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Malicorn de Grand Pre
